question: Which of the following incidents took place in the year 1919?
explanation: The Jallianwala Bagh massacre is also known as the Amritsar massacre. It took place on 13 April 1919 when troops of the British Indian Army under the command of Acting Brigadier-General Reginald Dyer fired rifles into a crowd of unarmed Indian civilians who had gathered in Jallianwala Bagh, Amritsar, and Punjab.
